name: WhichMovie
0:
”Alexa, ask which movie what's good.”
”Alexa, ask which movie for a mystery recommendation.”
”Alexa, ask which movie for a drama.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: which movie
des: Have you ever had a hard time deciding what movie to watch with your beautiful girlfriend or handsome boyfriend? Just ask Amazon Alexa and she'll recommend a popular movie to you at no charge! Amazing!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
